alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 02 at 6:34PM EDT until September 02 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HOUGHTON AND EAST CENTRAL ONTONAGON COUNTIES... At 634 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mass City, or 19 miles southeast of Ontonagon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Houghton and east central Ontonagon Counties, including the following locations... Bob Lake and Echo Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
